note.p: Birth: Charterhouse Square, London, England (18 May 1846)
Education: University College London; King's College, London (medicine). LSA diploma (1868). St John's College, Cambridge. MA

Career: Fellow of St John's College, Cambridge (1873); Professor of Comparative Anatomy (Zoology), King's College, London (1874-1879); Prosector to the Zoological Society of London; Fullerian Professor of Physiology, Royal Institution (1875); died of consumption
